name: Jsadakhata
body:
### Welcome to JSadaKhata
JSadakhata is a Javascript+HTML implemention of SADAKHATA. You just need to Download->unzip->Open **sadakhata.html**. It'll automatically opened with your default browser. Then write :)




### Authors and Contributors
This JavaScript implemention is developed by Hasib Al Muhaimin(@himuhasib). The [jsAvroPhonetic](https://github.com/torifat/jsAvroPhonetic) is forked from @torifat.

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with this??? Or found any **BUG** or got any idea on your head??? You are awesome!!! Let us know **himuhasib[at]gmail[dot]com**
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
